casebody.data:
(October 6, 1960)

Concur — Botein, P. J., Breitel, Babin, Valente and McNally, JJ.:

The People of the State of New York v. Radislaw Blazic et al.

Motion for leave to appeal as a poor person and for an assignment of counsel granted to the extent of assigning Irving Mendelson, Esq., of 217 Broadway, New York, New York, and Jacob W. Friedman, Esq., of 170 Broadway, New York, New York, as counsel for the appellant for the purposes of the appeal.
